components.name: Streamlit Application
components.description: The frontend interface where users interact with the application and authentication widgets.

components.name: Authentication Controller
components.description: Handles user authentication logic, including login, registration, and session management.

components.name: Cookie Model
components.description: Manages the creation and validation of authentication cookies for session persistence.

components.name: OAuth2 Models
components.description: Facilitates integration with external OAuth2 providers like Google and Microsoft for user authentication.

components.name: Hasher
components.description: Responsible for hashing user passwords to ensure secure storage and management.

data_flows.description: User credentials are submitted from the frontend to the backend for authentication.
Upon successful authentication, a session cookie is created and sent back to the frontend.
User requests OAuth2 login, redirecting to the external provider for authentication.
User passwords are hashed before being stored or compared during authentication.

trust_boundaries.name: User Interaction Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between the user and the application interface, where user inputs are collected.

trust_boundaries.name: Backend Processing Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between the frontend and backend components, where sensitive data is processed.

trust_boundaries.name: External Authentication Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between the application and external OAuth2 providers for user authentication.
